pullrequest.title: Back port the memory out-of-bound access issue for joint cfm

content.raw:
when someone calls `dxJoingXXX::getInfo1`, the modified variables are purely within incoming `dxJoint::Info1*` parameter data structure. By moving `m` to `dxJoint` or `dxJointXXX` class will require `getInfo1` to reach across memory boundary into `dxJoint`, I am not sure if there's any impact on code execution speed in that case.

Otherwise, it seems to be the right place for `m`.
